product_name: The North Face Nimbostratus Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Boys'
long_description: Bring on the clouds! The North Face Nimbostratus Triclimate boys' 3-in-1 jacket shields young skiers and riders from rain, snow and cold, so winter adventures stay fun. Shell jacket and insulating fleece liner jacket can be worn together for the ultimate in waterproof warmth, or either piece can be worn solo as weather warrants. HyVent(R) polyester shell is constructed with a waterproof, breathable coating for dry comfort. Fully sealed seams boost weatherproofness. Removable fleece liner jacket inside shell adds warmth without too much bulkiness; liner jacket attaches to shell jacket through zip-in and snap-in compatibility. ID label helps ensure his jacket won't get lost at ski school; key clip and secure internal pocket keep him organized. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs keep out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable heat. Fixed hood and zippered handwarmer pockets keep key areas cozy. Liner jacket in The North Face Nimbostratus Triclimate boys' jacket features dual hand pockets.
